languages.text: Вторая ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Особое поручение{/g}, мгновенно дает союзному персонажу {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} без {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, но с 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Если союзник находится под действием {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g} и убивает врага до конца хода офицера, то он получает (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ офицера) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} офицера мгновенно дает дополнительный ход союзнику с полными ОП и ОД. Этот союзник не имеет лимита на атаки до конца этого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} офицера: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} офицера: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерция{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}. Офицеры могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангардами{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}великими стратегами{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастерами-тактиками{/g}.

The Officer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g}, instantly grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. If this ally is also under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy by the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally will also gain (2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Officers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.
languages.original_text: Вторая ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Особое поручение{/g}, мгновенно дает союзному персонажу {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} без {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, но с 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Если союзник находится под действием {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Приказа командира{/g} и убивает врага до конца хода офицера, то он получает (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ОБЩ офицера) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} офицера мгновенно дает дополнительный ход союзнику с полными ОП и ОД. Этот союзник не имеет лимита на атаки до конца этого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} офицера: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} офицера: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Коммерция{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Знания: Империум{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}. Офицеры могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангардами{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}великими стратегами{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастерами-тактиками{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Leader's second keystone ability, Bring It Down!, instantly grants an ally an extra turn with 0 MP and (Leader's FEL bonus / 2) AP. If this ally is also under the effect of Voice of Command and kills an enemy until the end of the Leader's turn, the ally will also gain (2 × ally's resolve) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}. The Leader's heroic act instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key characteristics: Fellowship, Willpower, Toughness, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill. Skills: Persuasion, Coercion, Commerce, Lore (Imperium), Carouse. Leaders can become Vanguards, Strategists, or Tacticians.

The Leader's second keystone ability, Bring It Down!, instantly grants an ally an extra turn with 0 MP and (Leader's FEL bonus / 2) AP. If this ally is also under the effect of Voice of Command and kills an enemy until the end of the Leader's turn, the ally will also gain (2 × ally's resolve) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}. The Leader's heroic act instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key characteristics: Fellowship, Willpower, Toughness, Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill. Skills: Persuasion, Coercion, Commerce, Lore (Imperium), Carouse. Leaders can become Vanguards, Strategists, or Tacticians.

Leaders can become Vanguards, Strategists, or Tacticians.

The Officer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Bring It Down!, instantly grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. If this ally is also under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} of Voice of Command and kills an enemy by the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally will also gain (2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Officers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

The Officer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Bring It Down!, instantly grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. If this ally is also under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} of Voice of Command and kills an enemy by the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally will also gain (2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Officers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

languages.text: Die zweite Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Offiziers, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring es zu Ende!{/g}, gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Steht dieser Verbündete außerdem unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} von {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} und tötet bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers einen Feind, erhält der Verbündete zusätzlich (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Offiziers) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Offiziers gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort einen Zusatzzug mit vollen BP und AP. Der Verbündete hat außerdem bis zum Ende dieses Zusatzzugs kein Angriffslimit. Schlüssel-{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: Gefolgschaft, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}. Offiziere können zu Angehörigen der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikern{/g} werden.

The Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. traits.locale_text: Die zweite Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Offiziers, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring es zu Ende!{/g}, gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Steht dieser Verbündete außerdem unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} von {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Stimme des Kommandos{/g} und tötet bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers einen Feind, erhält der Verbündete zusätzlich (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Offiziers) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Offiziers gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort einen Zusatzzug mit vollen BP und AP. Der Verbündete hat außerdem bis zum Ende dieses Zusatzzugs kein Angriffslimit. Schlüssel-{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: Gefolgschaft, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}. Offiziere können zu Angehörigen der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikern{/g} werden.

Die zweite Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Offiziers, Bring es zu Ende!, gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Steht dieser Verbündete außerdem unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} von Stimme des Kommandos und tötet bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Offiziers einen Feind, erhält der Verbündete zusätzlich (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Offiziers) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Offiziers gewährt einem Verbündeten sofort einen Zusatzzug mit vollen BP und AP. Der Verbündete hat außerdem bis zum Ende dieses Zusatzzugs kein Angriffslimit. Schlüssel-{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: Gefolgschaft, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Überredung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Handel{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Wissen (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}. Offiziere können zu Angehörigen der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktikern{/g} werden.

languages.text: La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé de l'officier, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Descendez-le !{/g}, confère instantanément à un allié un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Si cet allié est également sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} et élimine un ennemi avant la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'officier, l'allié bénéficie également de (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g} de l'officier) points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'officier confère instantanément à un allié un tour supplémentaire avec tous ses PD et PA. De plus, l'allié n'est soumis à aucune limite d'attaque jusqu'à la fin de ce tour supplémentaire. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : Sociabilité, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}. Les officiers peuvent devenir des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleurs{/g}, des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grands stratèges{/g} ou des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maîtres tacticiens{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Officer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g}, instantly grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. If this ally is also under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy by the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally will also gain (2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Si cet allié est également sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voix du commandement{/g} et élimine un ennemi avant la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'officier, l'allié bénéficie également de (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SOC{/g} de l'officier) points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} de l'officier confère instantanément à un allié un tour supplémentaire avec tous ses PD et PA. De plus, l'allié n'est soumis à aucune limite d'attaque jusqu'à la fin de ce tour supplémentaire. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : Sociabilité, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Connaissance (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}. Les officiers peuvent devenir des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleurs{/g}, des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grands stratèges{/g} ou des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maîtres tacticiens{/g}.

languages.text: 军官的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，{g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}把它干掉！{/g}，可以让盟友立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在此回合内，盟友拥有0点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。 如果该盟友受到{g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指挥之声{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}的影响，而且在军官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前击杀过一名敌人，则该盟友会获得一次性额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于（2×军官的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）。 军官的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}会立刻给予盟友一个额外回合，额外回合内的移动点数与行动点数为满值。在此额外回合期间，盟友的攻击次数没有任何限制。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：社交、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}。 军官可以晋级为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Officer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g}, instantly grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. If this ally is also under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy by the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally will also gain (2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Officers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 军官的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，把它干掉！，可以让盟友立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。在此回合内，盟友拥有0点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}的影响，而且在军官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前击杀过一名敌人，则该盟友会获得一次性额外{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于（2×军官的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）。 军官的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}会立刻给予盟友一个额外回合，额外回合内的移动点数与行动点数为满值。在此额外回合期间，盟友的攻击次数没有任何限制。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：社交、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}劝说{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商业{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}知识（帝国）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}。 军官可以晋级为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}。

languages.text: La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los oficiales, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}¡Derribadlo!{/g}, concede inmediatamente a un aliado un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Si dicho aliado se halla, además, bajo el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} y mata a un enemigo antes de que termine el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial, también obtendrá (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del oficial) de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los oficiales concede inmediatamente a un aliado un turno extra con todos sus PM y PA. Dicho aliado, además, no verá limitados sus ataques hasta que acabe el turno extra. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: Empatía, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Coacción{/g}. Los oficiales pueden convertirse en {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardias{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grandes estrategas{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestros tácticos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Officer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g}, instantly grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. If this ally is also under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy by the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally will also gain (2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Officers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los oficiales, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}¡Derribadlo!{/g}, concede inmediatamente a un aliado un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Si dicho aliado se halla, además, bajo el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} de {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voz de mando{/g} y mata a un enemigo antes de que termine el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del oficial, también obtendrá (2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del oficial) de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los oficiales concede inmediatamente a un aliado un turno extra con todos sus PM y PA. Dicho aliado, además, no verá limitados sus ataques hasta que acabe el turno extra. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: Empatía, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasión{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Comercio{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Conocimiento (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Coacción{/g}. Los oficiales pueden convertirse en {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardias{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grandes estrategas{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestros tácticos{/g}.

languages.original_text: The second key ability, Special Assignment, instantly grants an allied character a turn with no OP, but with (2) OD. If an ally under the effect of this ability kills an enemy before the end of the leader's turn, he gains (2 × Ally's Resolve) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g}. The leader's heroic act instantly grants an additional turn to an ally with full OP and OD. This ally has no attack limit until the end of that turn. Important Leader Traits: Sociability, Will, Endurance, Close Combat, Ranged Combat. Leader Skills: Persuasion, Pressure, Commerce, Knowledge: Imperium, Resilience. Leaders can become vanguards, strategists or tacticians.

languages.text: 士官の二番目に重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}打ち倒せ！{/g}であり、これは瞬時に味方一人に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}と0{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}および2{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を獲得する。 味方が {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}指揮の声{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受け、士官の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了前に敵を撃破した場合、その味方はまた{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を（2 x 士官の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）得る。 士官の{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}は即座に味方1人に追加ターンを獲得し最大MPおよびAPを与える。この追加ターンの終了時まで、この味方の攻撃に制限はない。 主要{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：連帯、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}説得{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}商取引{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}伝承（帝国）{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}。 士官は{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}、あるいは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}になることができる。
languages.original_text: The Officer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g}, instantly grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. If this ally is also under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy by the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally will also gain (2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Officers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Officers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.

languages.text: Subay'ın ikinci kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} olan {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Yere Ser!{/g}, bir dost birime anında 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}'ye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır. Bu dost birim ayrıca {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Emir Sözü{/g}'nün {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkisi{/g} altındaysa ve Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sonlanmadan önce bir düşman öldürürse o dost birim aynı zamanda (2 × Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}SYL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}) kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır. Subay'ın {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g} bir dost birime anında tam HP ve EP'ye sahip bir ek tur kazandırır. Ayrıca bu ek turun sonuna kadar da dost birimin saldırı sınırı ortadan kalkar. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: Sosyallik, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}İkna{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Tecim{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Kültür (İmparatorluk){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Tiryakilik{/g}. Subaylar; {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen'e{/g} dönüşebilirler.
languages.original_text: The Officer's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g}, instantly grants an ally an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. If this ally is also under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} of {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} and kills an enemy by the end of the Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the ally will also gain (2 × Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. The Officer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly grants an ally an extra turn with full MP and AP. The ally also has no limit on attacks until the end of this extra turn. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: Fellowship, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Officers can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategists{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tacticians{/g}.
